titleStmt.title: An epistle to all that's young in the truth and lately convinced who walk with, and assemble amongst the people of God called Quakers, that they may escape the wiles of Satan and continue and walk in the way of righteousness.
titleStmt.author: Crook, John, 1617-1699.
Greene, Thomas, 1634?-1699.

notesStmt.note: Signed and dated: John Crooke and Thomas Green, London, 1672.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
